body_html: Yes, ~/homebrew/bin is in my path, but for some reason it's not picked up by the BUILD system. Will check to see what PATH is used when building through bazel and see if there's a way to fix. Thanks!

body: Yes, ~/homebrew/bin is in my path, but for some reason it's not picked up by the BUILD system. Will check to see what PATH is used when building through bazel and see if there's a way to fix. Thanks!
